meteo-registration.name: meteo.guenthers.net
meteo-registration.comments: The Setup includes approx. 12 additional Wireless Temperature/Humidity/Pressure-Sensors from ELV, http://www.ELV.de, Type e.g. IA2000 to monitor some points in the house and garage. The Station itself will control a Pan/Tilt/Zoom-Weathercamera in the near future to have the camera looking straight into the wind.

technical-info.connection: Equinox Multiport SST-8P, polls Vantage, ELV, controls Weathercam
